title: Measuring Macron: Is France’s leader rebooting the economy?
text:
Measuring Macron: Is France’s leader rebooting the economy? 9:49pm IST - 02:08
French President Emmanuel Macron swept into office last May on a pledge to create jobs and improve the lives of workers by rebooting the country's economy. A year on, annual economic growth has picked up - but soo too has resistance to his reform programme from France's powerful unions. David Pollard reports.
